name: CO2 Offset
description: GreenHouseGas/CO2 compensation as a service. Get 1kg/month for free to see how easy it is to implement.

api_methods.name: List existing Compensations
api_methods.description: Returns a list of all existing co2offset certificates linked to account.

api_methods.name: Retrieve Compensation
api_methods.description: Response contains full compensation details (if exists, and owner is account).

api_methods.name: Compensate GHG/CO2
api_methods.description:
**Compensate given amount of GHG/CO2eq and provides certificate reference as result.**
